Before using this extension please make backup of your bookmarks.

Ext. in the test mode now. So the Author disclaims responsibility for damaged links or other losses associated with the use of the extension. However, we make a lot of efforts so that you do not lose your bookmarks.
In case of force majeure, or if you still made a mistake and damaged your bookmarks, here is an emergency instruction:
Go to the address in the explorer of your PC: simply enter the line:
%AppData%\Local\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default
Find the file Bookmarks.bak
Make a copy of it, then remove the file extension.
Replace exist file "Bookmarks". 
How to see or change the file extension, if this is not possible, read on the Internet. I recommend to reading other device such phone.

Bookmark Cleaner: Keep Your Bookmarks Organized and Error-Free!

Bookmark Cleaner is a powerful and user-friendly extension that scans your bookmarks for broken or outdated links and helps you manage them efficiently. With detailed statistics and customizable conditions, you can easily identify and remove problematic bookmarks, ensuring a clean and organized browsing experience.

Key Features:

Automatic Link Checking: Scans your bookmarks for errors, such as "404 Not Found" or connection issues.
Custom Conditions: Add and customize conditions to detect specific link problems, tailored to your needs.
Detailed Statistics: Get real-time statistics on total and broken bookmarks, with detailed breakdowns.
Backup Management: Create backups of your bookmarks before making changes, and restore them anytime.
Effortless Export: Export reports of broken bookmarks to a CSV file for further review.
One-Click Cleanup: Quickly remove all broken bookmarks with a single click.
Seamless Background Operation: Continue bookmark checks even when working in other tabs.
Enhance your productivity by keeping your bookmarks clean and functional with Bookmark Cleaner. Try it now and experience hassle-free bookmark management!
